changelog: Fixed player not loading correctly with some custom multicharacters
Fixed double loading on some occasion
Fixed moving far from original vehicle position breaking the script
Update to new logo
Big performance optimization compared to V2 (~40% across the board)
Now SHV can handle infinite amount of shops with no performance cost !
New _simple.lua files for easily adapting with your server without any need to modify the main files
New export for checking vehicle on sale (IsVehicleOnSale)
Fixed script not loading correctly on some servers
Added ox_lib as dependecy
Automatic database check & installer instead of old fixSQL command
Switched from old menus to ox_lib menu
Moved vehicleinfo to their own file + optimization
Fixed script timeout on huge amount of vehicles
Better information on new updates
Fixed notification icon sometimes not showing correctly
Fixed vehicle name overflow for 2D Text information
Better vehicle spawn handler
Fixed some security problem on event handlers
Removed unused config
Fixed model blacklist not working correctly
V2 ADDED TEST
V2 REMOVED TEST
V2 MODIFIED TEST
